lore: The Diabolic Spectator never stops exercising its muscles, even while traveling, as it relies on its own fists to bring down its enemies. When two comrades-in-arms decide to resolve their differences by means of violence, this creature usually tries to mediate between them by puffing its chest and throwing a defiant look. This usually ends with the three of them fighting on the ground, so it's hard to tell whether its intention is really to stop the conflict or to join it as a show of strength.
menagerieDialog: I'm tired of running around, everything hurts! Can't we rest for a little while?
What are we doing here? Let's get moving!
My hounds crave the flesh of humans. What do you say we go out and start a war to sate their appetites?
(It's busy feeding rotten meat to its pups.)
(It's having a difficult time controlling its beasts. What has them so anxious?)
name: Diabolic Spectator
